mc_user_reviews.text: This whole movie wreaked of a commercial Hollywood production poorly disguised as an indie film.
Sorry for the traslation, is mechanical.

A nice film with a well-written but unbelievable script. The movements are truncated, and in doing so resolve to make no sense. Well-executed but underwhelming. Had they taken half-an-hour longer to make the character connections believable, it might have worked.

It was engaging at first, but the middle and especially ending don't live up to what it could have been.  It's a shame, too, because there are many great actors in this. (Robin Williams was miscast in this though)
